options.name: add
options.description: top level add

options.name: tomatoes
options.description: Add tomatoes to a user

options.name: user_ids
options.description: All the user IDs to get tomatoes added to, separated by a space

options.name: amount
options.description: The amount of tomatoes to add

options.name: vials
options.description: Add vials to a user

options.name: user_ids
options.description: All the user IDs to get tomatoes added to, separated by a space

options.name: amount
options.description: The amount of tomatoes to add

options.name: lemons
options.description: Add lemons to a user

options.name: user_ids
options.description: All the user IDs to get tomatoes added to, separated by a space

options.name: amount
options.description: The amount of tomatoes to add

options.name: card
options.description: Add a card to a user

options.name: user_id
options.description: The user ID to add a card to

options.name: card_query
options.description: The card query or card name of the card you want to add

options.name: cards
options.description: Add multiple cards to a user

options.name: user_id
options.description: The user ID to add cards to

options.name: card_query
options.description: The card query of the cards you want to add

options.name: role
options.description: Add a role to a user

options.name: user_ids
options.description: All the user IDs to get roles added to, separated by a space

options.name: role
options.description: The role to add to the users

options.name: remove
options.description: top level remove

options.name: card
options.description: Remove a card from a user

options.name: user_id
options.description: The user ID to remove a card from

options.name: card_query
options.description: The card query or card name of the card you want to remove

options.name: role
options.description: Remove a role from a user

options.name: user_ids
options.description: All the user IDs to get roles removed from, separated by a space

options.name: role
options.description: The role to remove from the users

options.name: eval
options.description: top level eval

options.name: info
options.description: View admin stats on card eval

options.name: card_query
options.description: The card query or card name of the card you want to view eval info on

options.name: force
options.description: Force waiting evals into live evals

options.name: card_query
options.description: The card query or card name of the card you want to force eval on

options.name: reset
options.description: Reset current auction eval for a card

options.name: card_id
options.description: The card id of the card you want to reset eval for

options.name: guild
options.description: top level guild

options.name: lock
options.description: Sudo lock a guild

options.name: collection
options.description: The collection to lock to

options.name: unlock
options.description: Sudo unlock a guild

options.name: herocheck
options.description: Force a herocheck in current guild

options.name: lead
options.description: top level lead

options.name: tomatoes
options.description: Display the admin leaderboard for tomatoes

options.name: vials
options.description: Display the admin leaderboard for vials

options.name: lemons
options.description: Display the admin leaderboard for lemons

options.name: cards
options.description: Display the admin leaderboard for unique cards

options.name: completed
options.description: Display the admin leaderboard for completion count

options.name: clout
options.description: Display the admin leaderboard for clout total

options.name: level
options.description: Display the admin leaderboard for user level

options.name: reset
options.description: top level reset

options.name: daily
options.description: Reset a users daily

options.name: user_ids
options.description: The user IDs of the users to reset daily

options.name: reverse
options.description: top level reverse

options.name: transaction
options.description: Reverse a transaction

options.name: transaction_id
options.description: The transaction ID to reverse

options.name: embargo
options.description: Remove a rating from a card

options.name: user_ids
options.description: The user IDs of the users to embargo, separated by a space

options.name: lift
options.description: Whether to lift an embargo or not

options.name: wip
options.description: Enable Maintenance Mode

options.name: message
options.description: The message to display to a user attempting commands while under maintenance

options.name: announce
options.description: Send a bot announcement

options.name: title
options.description: The title of the announcement

options.name: message
options.description: The body of the announcement

options.name: auclock
options.description: Lockout the ability to auction cards

options.name: inrole
options.description: Find users in a specific role

options.name: role
options.description: The role to add to the users

options.name: stress
options.description: Spam test messages according to amount

options.name: amount
options.description: The amount of times to stress

options.name: summon
options.description: Summon any card in the bot

options.name: card_query
options.description: The card query or card name of the card you want to add

options.name: crash
options.description: Crash the bot

options.name: transfer
options.description: Transfer all cards from one account to another

options.name: from
options.description: The user ID to remove cards from

options.name: to
options.description: The user ID to add cards to

options.name: refresh
options.description: top level refresh

options.name: global
options.description: Refresh all global commands. MAY CAUSE BOT TO NOT RESPOND FOR AN HOUR

options.name: admin
options.description: Refresh all admin commands. Should update within minutes
